com.labyrinthconquest.game.gameobjects

Class Player

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.labyrinthconquest.game.gameobjects.GameObject
      • com.labyrinthconquest.game.gameobjects.DynamicGameObject
        • com.labyrinthconquest.game.gameobjects.Player

  • public class Player
extends DynamicGameObject
    Represents all the playable characters in the game

              float height,

              short category,
              short mask)
        Create a new player object
        Parameters:
        texturePath - Texture file path
        world - Box2D world
        level - Level of the object
        x - X position
        y - Y position
        width - Width of the object
        height - Height of the object
        id - Identification (name) of the player
        category - Collision category
        mask - Collision mask

        private boolean checkTimeSinceLastMove()
